data.name: Unit 4 - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Bring the space-faring tunes of Unit 4 always with you with this official soundtrack! More than 30 minutes of catchy 8-bit music to relive your epic journey through the bonker universe of Unit 4.

Track list

01 - DOOMO's Theme
02 - DOOMO - Tedious' Euphony
03 - DOOMO - Rose's Rhapsody
04 - 1CY-F1R3's Theme
05 - 1CY-F1R3 - Ki's Euphony
06 - 1CY-F1R3 - Starboy's Rhapsody
07 - D00M-ST4R's Theme
08 - D00M-ST4R - Grimm's Euphony
09 - D00M-ST4R - Void's Rhapsody
10 - Ship's Theme
11 - Galaxy Map Theme
12 - R33T-T41L's Melody
13 - TR4SH-3's Melody
14 - DIDGERIDOO's Melody
15 - CH1-L1's Melody
16 - KRUCHANKA's Melody
17 - ROMBANAPOLIS - Racing Scooter's Rhythm
18 - ROSTICON - Racing Submarine's Rhythm
19 - SP4RR0W-ST4R - Racing Astroship's Rhythm
20 - NESTIWAL - Bouncing Madness's Rhythm
21 - TAMUKAME - Climbing Boxes's Rhythm
22 - NOXIOS IV - Space Brawl's Rhythm
23 - Cosmic Symphony
24 - Fabolous 4

All MP3 files will be downloaded in steamapps/common/Unit 4/Soundtrack
